Name: Le Sang
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Review: The tannin in the wine balances the fruit and sweetness nicely.
History: French for 'blood', this cocktail is a twist on the classic Spanish Sangria, which also means 'blood'.
Nutrition: One serving of Le Sang contains 233 calories
